channel.title: Spawning 2 items when only wanted 1 item..? PI
channel.description: [center][b]hey guys i need help i've google'd and even looked into my source files but im not understanding why whenever i do ::item # ( amount ) it always spawns 2 items instead of the 1 item i wanted to spawn..[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/10zoc3t.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]any ideas? thanks! [size=10pt][i][b]Fish[/b][/i][/size][/b][/center]

item.source: Spawning 2 items when only wanted 1 item..? PI

item.title: Spawning 2 items when only wanted 1 item..? PI
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:3, topic:399952”]Ok, you have 2 ::item commands in commands.java. By any chance is your server a spawn server? Because if it is, you should delete the ::item command for player rights 3, because it’s reading both commands and it gives you 2.

Just search ::item and delete the one you don’t want.

Cheers.[/quote]

its not a spawn servers only owners can spawn :o

Read full topic
item.source: Spawning 2 items when only wanted 1 item..? PI

item.title: Spawning 2 items when only wanted 1 item..? PI
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Ok, you have 2 ::item commands in commands.java. By any chance is your server a spawn server? Because if it is, you should delete the ::item command for player rights 3, because it’s reading both commands and it gives you 2.

Just search ::item and delete the one you don’t want.

Cheers.

Read full topic
